lines.gurmukhi: kr AMjul jl jobn p√çysu AwlI mwn qij pRwnpiq piq riq mwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Kar Anjul Jal Joban Pravaysu Aalee , Maan Taji Praanapati Pati Rati Maaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: O! friend entering in youth! abandon all ego and take water (of humility) in your hand, worship the Lord husband the Master of all lives and lodge His love in your heart.

lines.gurmukhi: gMDrb ngr gq rjnI ibhwq jwq AOsur ABIc Aiq dulB kY jwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Gandharab Nagar Gat Rajanee Bihaat Jaata , Aousur Abheech Ati Dulabh Kai Jaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Like an imaginary world, this night-like life being imaginary is passing by. So consider this human birth as an invaluable opportunity that stars have favoured you with for meeting the Lord God.

lines.gurmukhi: ishjw kusm kumlwq murJwq pun pun pCuqwq smo Awvq n AwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Sihajaa Kousam Koumalaat Murajhaat Pouna , Poun Pachhoutaat Samo Aavat N Aaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As the flowers on the nuptial bed withers away, this invaluable time once gone past will not return. One will repent repeatedly.

lines.gurmukhi: soeI br nwir piRX pRXwr AiDkwrI pRXwrI smJ isAwnI qoso bynqI bKwnIAY ]659]
lines.transliteration_english: Soee Bar Naari Priy Pyaar Adhikaaree Pyaaree , Samajh Siaanee Toso Baynatee Bakhaaneeai ?659?

Shabad OS B.translation: O dear friend! I pray to you to be wise and understand this important fact, that she alone is supreme seeker female, who becomes dejure owner of her Lord's love and, ultimately becomes His beloved.  (659)
